body:
Then just do a smoketest. Run the script for each of the CI machines but don't check the output (or maybe regex for some really important parameters; e.g., the CUDA 8 build should actually report CUDA 8).

But I will say that I really appreciated seeing the expect files with actual information about the machines in the PR.
